item.description:
Raw Gourmet Rawliday Community Dinner

Raw Chef and Chianti Restaurant owner, Richard Moreno, who always does a wonderful job, will be providing a six course raw gourmet meal. Richard's presentation is spectacular and the company is always fun. The last time everyone loved the event.

Fabulous 6 course dinner some featured dishes
Belgian Endive Crostini Appetizer
Penne Bolognese zucchini-based ziti served in a tomato meet with tomato cream
Butternut squash Ravioli in a sage sauce
Orange Vinaigrette Salad
Chocolate Raspberry Mousse

RSVP only by telephone: 978-921-2233.
Children under 8 are free.

For the latest events, please check www.RawNewEnglandCommunity.com.
item.name: Raw Gourmet Rawliday Community Dinner
